title: I often wake up with random songs in my head. What’s the best or most random song you’ve ever woken to? - Quora

response.answer_text: These days i listen to music almost all the time and rarely sleep, so hard to say any song that would be stuck in my head. i can share a tangentially related anecdote. i used to sleep with the TV on. Whatever channel i fell asleep to at night would turn to infomercial sometime early in the morning. After a week of the Ninja blender commercials, one morning I woke up and just had to have one. I almost never buy stuff from infomercials, and i didn't even cook at the time. it is a really nice blender though.

I’ll give you best AND most random. Best — 1 - James Gang, Funk 49. “I know where you’re go-innnn…” Most random — 1- Ooo-mpa…loom-pa…doob-a-dee doo… 2- The Empire Carpet jingle (5–8–8…2–3-hundred…Em-piiiiiire! Today.) 3-Five dollar. Five dollar. Five dollar foot-loooong 4-The theme to the Stephen Colbert show 5-”Helloooo dad…/I’m in JAIL!!!….JAIL!!!…It’s NICE…I LIKE it….Helloooo dad…”
